Detailed Description

This class is used compressed data to write to a stream.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ZipOStream::ZipOStream ( BinaryOStream &  dstStream,
int  compressLevel = 1 
)

Constructor.

Parameters:
dstStream The stream to write the compressed data to. Note that this class keeps a reference to this stream and only writes to it in the destructor.
compressLevel The level of compression to use.

This method reserves the input number of bytes on this stream.

Parameters:
